original_text: Each year, at the time for the Passover festival, the Roman ruler would let one person go free out of the prison. The people could choose which person should go free.
korean_text: 명절이 되면 총독이 무리의 청원대로 죄수 한 사람을 놓아 주는 전례가 있더니

sentences.original_text: Each year, at the time for the Passover festival,
the Roman ruler would let one person go free
sentences.korean_translation: 로마 통치자는 한 사람을 석방하곤 했고
